name: ALAMEDA COUNTY TRANSPORTATION COMMISSION
sampleDescriptions: Oppose cuts in the President's FY18 budget related to highways and transit funding.
Implementation of project streamlining and transportation enhancements in FAST Act. Implementation of FAST Act. Support Congressional Freight Caucus. Support for infrastructure package.
Support language to allow the use of local sales tax revenue generated on the sale of aviation fuel to be used for projects outlined in local sales tax measures.
Implementation of project streamlining and transportation enhancements in FAST Act. Implementation of FAST Act. Support Congressional Freight Caucus. Support for infrastructure package.
Oppose cuts in the President's FY19 budget related to highways and transit funding.
